text: Crowd puller:Tourism fair which was kick-started in the second week of January will be on till March 17 in Chennai. As many as 29 State govt. departments, 13 State govt. undertakings and 2 central govt. departments have put up stalls here. (Clockwise from top) The amusement rides; various pavilions; the Hindu Religious and Charitable Endowments pavilion and the Chennai Police Department pavilion displaying different types of weapons.— Photos: K.V. Srinivasan & R. Ragu
title: 40 {+t} {+h} India Tourism & Trade Fair
